We (Compose, YC s11, now part of IBM) are hiring for a bunch of positions. Notably â€”

* Platform engineers (https://www.compose.io/jobs/#platform-engineer): if you like working on distributed systems, containers, and tremendous database problems in the real world, this is for you.

* Designer who speaks HTML/CSS and possibly javascript (https://www.compose.io/jobs#designer): work on a wide variety of projects, from stunning print materials to cutting edge web applications. If can draw on a strong foundation in color theory, layout, and typography you'd probably like this role.

* Support Engineer (https://www.compose.io/jobs#support-engineer): we have thousands of paying customers, almost all developers. If you like helping people solve problems and want to learn more about different databases along the way, this is for you. This is a good role for a developer with great written communication skills.

We are remote friendly, but can currently only hire in the US, Canada, UK, Australia, Germany, and Israel.
